import React, { useState } from 'react' import {css} from "./Create.css" import axios from 'axios'; export default function Create() { const myapi="https://63ea415e811db3d7ef0a6c6d.mockapi.io/crud"; const[fname,setfname]=useState(); const[lname,setlname]=useState(); const[number,setnumber]=useState(); const[dob,setdob]=useState(); const[department,setdepartment]=useState(); axios.post(myapi,{ f_name:fname, l_name:lname, my_num:number, my_dob:dob, my_dept:department }); return ( <>
